title: Interest rate on small savings scheme to remain unchanged for Q1 in FY 24-25
description:
Interest rate on small savings scheme to remain unchanged for Q1 in FY 24-25 The deposit under the Sukanya Samriddhi scheme will attract an interest rate of 8.2 per cent, while the rate on a three-year term deposit remains at 7.1 per cent.

New Delhi:

The Centre on Friday informed that the interest...
